Symbolic Links
Once the build process is up and running, I like to create symbolic links from the build directory to $SPLUNK_HOME/etc/apps.

Here is an example I use:
ln -s /[your build directory]/SplunkConf2014Example/app/build/SplunkConf2014Example $SPLUNK_HOME/etc/apps/
